name: We need change!
description:
Story

You don't like goverment's decisions and you decide that you can't take it any more. So next day you go out on the street with a sign. Collect similar thinking people to make your group stronger. You are stronger together!

Theme implementation

Theme is hidden in games mechanics. Your group's strength depends on your follower count. More followers = more guards you can pass.

Controls

You can choose from two different options:

  • Keyboarad (using A and D)
  • Mouse

Few words from developer

Thank you all for playing my game! I am a student so I did not have much time, but I tried my best. Hope you like it!
